title.rendered: EY Foundation collaborates with Smile Foundation for Mission Education Programme

content.rendered:
EY Foundation collaborates with Smile Foundation for Mission Education Programme

The EY Foundation has collaborated with Smile Foundation’s Mission Education program to introduce the School Improvement Programme in two government-aided schools located in Kolkata, West Bengal. The primary objective of this partnership is to enrich the teaching and learning experience by promoting STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics) and digital education. Additionally, the project aims to establish an ideal learning atmosphere by providing essential infrastructural support, enhancing teacher training and development for long-term sustainability, and fostering active engagement and support from stakeholders for the benefit of the schools.
